Package com.beepell.expression

Interface Summary
ExpressionContext  
 

Class Summary
BooleanExpression Expression used in transition, while, and if conditions.
CopyQuery  
DeadlineExpression Expression used in until expression of <onAlarm> and <wait>.
DurationExpression for expression of <onAlarm> and <wait>, <repeatEvery> expression of <onAlarm>
FunctionResolver An implementation of XPathFunctionResolver based on ExpressionContext.
GeneralExpression General Expression used in <assign>.
JoinConditionExpression Expression used in transition, while, and if conditions.
LinkStateResolver Implementation of XPathVariableResolver to access link state as XPath variables.
PropertyAliasQuery Property Aliases may contain a query.
Resolver VariableResolver and FunctionResolver share the toXPathObject method.

TestCopyQuery Test Copy Query.
TestDeadlineExpression Test Deadline Expressions.
TestDurationExpression Test Deadline Expressions.
TestExpressionContext Dummy implementation of ExpressionContext for testing.
TestFunctionResolver Testing FunctionResolver.
TestGeneralExpression Test General Expression.
TestJoinConditionExpression Test Join Condition Expression
TestLinkStateResolver Testing LinkStateResolver
TestPropertyAliasQuery Test Property Alias Query
TestUnsignedIntegerExpression Test Unsigned Integer Expression.
TestVariableResolver Testing the VariableResolver
UnsignedIntegerExpression Expression used in <startCounterValue>, <finalCounterValue>, and <branches> in <forEach>
VariableResolver An implementation of XPathVariableResolver based on ExpressionContext.
XPathExpression
